headers.subject: [tosdr:2048] May charge late payment and collections fees

html:
Applies to outlook.com skydrive.com, live.com, account.live.com, profile.microsoft.com, msn.com, bing.com, office.com, Windows Photo Gallery, Windows Movie Maker, Microsoft Mail, Windows Live Writer and "other Microsoft Services" that link to these terms (oddly enough Microsoft.com has a different ToS).



9.11. Late payments. You must pay for all reasonable costs we incur to collect any past due amounts. These include reasonable attorneys' fees and other legal fees and costs.

 

From <http://windows.microsoft.com/en-us/windows-live/microsoft-services-agreement> 

--
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr

subject: May charge late payment and collections fees
text:
Applies to outlook.com skydrive.com, live.com, account.live.com, 
profile.microsoft.com, msn.com, bing.com, office.com, Windows Photo 
Gallery, Windows Movie Maker, Microsoft Mail, Windows Live Writer and 
"other Microsoft Services" that link to these terms (oddly enough 
Microsoft.com has a different ToS).


9.11. Late payments. You must pay for all reasonable costs we incur to 
> collect any past due amounts. These include reasonable attorneys' fees and 
> other legal fees and costs.
>
>  
>
> From <
> http://windows.microsoft.com/en-us/windows-live/microsoft-services-agreement
> > 
>

--
